com.intuit.wasabi.email.impl

Class NoopEmailImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intuit.wasabi.email.impl.NoopEmailImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EmailService

    public class NoopEmailImpl
extends Object
implements EmailService
    Add a noop implementation that can be used in the test setting where we do not want to sent out emails.

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Description copied from interface: EmailService
        This returns whether the EmailService implementation is activated at the moment or not. The value can be changed while the service is running with EmailService.setActive(boolean)
        Specified by:
        isActive in interface EmailService
        Returns:
        true when emails are sent.

      • setActive

        public void setActive(boolean active)
        Description copied from interface: EmailService
        En- or disables the EmailService. The concrete implementation of an inactive service can vary among different implementations.
        Specified by:
        setActive in interface EmailService
        Parameters:
        active - set to true when EmailService should sent emails
